title: Interference
author: verias
text:
Seems the girls have been long awaiting this day, if only for a chance to give dogboy a makeover.

Still yet, no one seems very curious -why- he's going to earth, but let's just see what the girls have in mind, shall we?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I figured flat out curiosity. But I admit to seeing what the girls will do. Magical Holographic projection?
